ResourceHeader.Description: Glyndon (GLYN) Magnetometer Station is located in Glyndon, Minnesota, USA.  It is one of the nine magnetometers of the Mid-continent MAgnetoseismic Chain (McMAC).
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: The operation of the Glyndon fluxgate magnetometer is managed by Prof. Linda Winkler, Minnesota State University Moorhead.

InformationURL.Name: McMAC Glyndon Station
InformationURL.Description: Information about the McMAC Glyndon Ground Magnetometer Station
